Test AFT Cooperative Learning Model

Source: R/AFTCoop.r
test_AFTCoop.Rd

Evaluates a trained AFT cooperative learning model on test data by generating predictions and calculating concordance indices for each rho value.

Usage

test_AFTCoop(x_test1, x_test2, y_test, training_result)

Arguments

x_test1

A matrix or data frame of the first set of test predictors. Must have the same features (columns) as x_training1 used in training.

x_test2

A matrix or data frame of the second set of test predictors. Must have the same features (columns) as x_training2 used in training.

y_test

A data frame containing test survival outcomes with columns:

  • overall_survival: Numeric survival time

  • status: Numeric event indicator (1 = event, 0 = censored)

training_result

A list object returned by train_AFTCoop containing the trained model coefficients and parameters.

Value

A list containing:

pred

Named list of test set predictions for each rho value. Higher predicted values indicate higher risk (shorter predicted survival).

cindex

Named list of concordance indices (C-index) on test data for each rho value. Values range from 0 to 1, where 0.5 indicates random predictions and 1.0 indicates perfect concordance.

Details

This function applies the coefficients learned during training to new test data. For each rho value in the trained model:

  1. Extracts the corresponding coefficient vector

  2. Generates risk predictions using predict_aft_coop

  3. Calculates the concordance index (C-index) comparing predictions to actual outcomes
